variables.variable: import test_firedrake_assemble as test import firedrake as fd one_form = fd.assemble(fd.action(test.M,test.f))
import test_firedrake_assemble as test import firedrake as fd zero_form = fd.assemble(fd.action(fd.action(test.M,test.f),test.one))

pass_tests.test: import firedrake as fd assert isinstance(one_form, fd.Function)
